column1: #Text=W - Why is n't she waking up ?

#Text=" Main Iroh Jinora Korra Antagonists Unalaq Vaatu Wan Shi Tong says : " Minor Bumi Kya May - Jim Tenzin " Shiro Shinobi says : " Kuvira has defeated the Avatar and now controls the entire Earth Empire .
#Text=Luckily , the airbender kids and Opal rescued Korra and escaped Zaofu .
#Text=For the first time in three years , Korra will finally be back in Republic City !
#Text=Meanwhile , Varrick and Bolin escaped from Baatar Jr. and are on the run .
#Text=But will they make it back to the city in time to warn everyone about Kuvira 's new spirit energy super weapon ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I missed you so much , girl !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Are n't you a sight for sore eyes !
#Text=Bum - Ju and I sure missed you .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's so great to see you again , Bumi .
